name: DNA x402 Payment Bridge
description: Bridges DNA x402 micropayment audit logs and signed receipts into Liquefy vaults. Supports Pay-Prove-Pack workflow for AI agent commerce.
author: Parad0x Labs

dnaServerUrl.description: URL of the DNA x402 server (e.g. http://localhost:8080)

adminToken.description: Admin token for authenticated DNA endpoints (optional)

vaultOut.description: Output directory for DNA payment vault data

autoArchive.description: If true, auto-pack exported data into .null vault after export

commands.export: Export DNA audit logs + receipts to Liquefy-ready directory
commands.status: Check DNA server connection and payment stats
commands.archive: Export + pack into .null vault in one step
